item.description:
Think only professional lobbyists can lobby? Think again! The Humane Society of the United States invites our members, supporters, and other animal advocates to participate in the Maine Humane Lobby Day in Augusta, and help make a tremendous difference for animals.

This is an exciting opportunity to meet directly with your elected officials and their staff about legislation that will significantly impact animals. There will be a briefing with tips for lobbying, and an overview of pending animal legislation that will prepare you to meet your elected officials and advocate for animals.

to RSVP- http://action.humanes...
item.how_to_find_us: Formerly St. Paul Center, now called the Hill Mansion- We'll be in the Parlor!

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: 2011 Maine Humane Lobby Day
